post.body: Yeah, looked like a good trip. BTW, have sleep-tips for you but >140 chars. Sleep deprivation a specialty of mine. :-)
Happy New Year to you too! Going well -- 2 weeks off work! :-) Back on Monday. How you doin'?
How did you explain "bling" to an almost 60 year old? My phone can't even spell it.
That one requires some elaboration. Please, illustrate with examples and analysis. Discuss.
Giving it a go. Thanks.
(18h later) Yes, more than one box actually. Probably not the cheapest but not so far off it that the service isn't worth it.
Yes. They are excellent service-wise. Have been with them for about a year -- no complaints.
Your blog is down -- home page shows the WordPress installation screen.
Missed your earlier tweet. The operational platform is already Linux. They're just switching from running in VMs to native.
Hey, @twitsms, you missed an @reply. What am I doing wrong? Do you hate me? :-)
Sometimes, you either go Zen or go mad. And people who've never faced the choice have trouble telling the difference.
3JAM only works for DM's. How can I get @replies and other notifications on my phone now that Twitter won't do it?
Merry Christmas! :-)
All over. And not nearly as unpleasant as our economists would like.
All right. Let's DO this. BRING it ON! ROCK THEIR WORLD! ROCK THEIR WORLD!!!
Preparing for the traditional last minute Christmas Eve shop at Westfield. Wish me luck.
Salvation Army just set itself up at the end of our driveway and played Christmas carrols. It was sweet!
Watching primary school production of The Jungle Book.
Is there such a thing as an "animated JPEG"???
Estimating. Anticipating having to mount a vigourous defence. Memory is the most under-rated (or under-valued) of the human virtues.
